sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
has not happened yet
, se do zdajšnjega trenutka še ni zgodilo.

seg.quote: I haven't made up my mind yet.
Have you had your lunch yet?

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
should not be done yet
, tistega ne smemo narediti zdaj, pač pa pozneje.

seg.quote: Loosen nuts with a spanner but don't take them off yet.

sense.def:
Z besedo
yet
povemo, da še obstaja možnost, da se bo nekaj zgodilo.

seg.quote: The figures may yet be revised again.
There is hope for me yet.

sense.def:
Besedo
yet
uporabljamo za izrazi za obdobja, kadar hočemo povedati, koliko časa se bo neko stanje še nadaljevalo.

seg.quote: He's going to be around for a long while yet.
It will not be dark for half an hour yet.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
has yet to do something
, nečesa še ni storil, bo pa morda tisto storil v prihodnosti. Kadar nekaj
is yet to happen
, se še ni zgodilo, utegne pa se zgoditi v prihodnosti.

seg.quote: I have yet to meet a man I can trust.
A whole range of issues had yet to be resolved.

sense.def:
Z besedo
yet
uvedemo dejstvo, ki se zdi precej presenetljivo glede na tisto, kar smo pravkar rekli.

seg.quote: Everything around him was blown to pieces, yet the minister escaped without a scratch.

sense.def:
Z besedo
yet
poudarimo primernik ali drugo besedo, ki se nanaša na povečanje ali ponavljanje.

seg.quote: I am sorry to bring up the subject of money yet again.
The queues are likely to grow longer yet.
